techmeme.title: LinkedIn says short-form video is its fastest-growing content category, and total video viewership grew 36% YoY between October 30, 2024 and January 29, 2025 (Alexander Lee/Digiday)
Apple agrees to a $20M settlement to resolve claims that some Watch batteries swelled over time, potentially damaging other key components, such as the display (Samantha Kelly/CNET)
Finout, which makes cloud cost management software, raised a $40M Series C, following a $26M Series B in March, bringing its total raised to $85M (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
Kraken says its revenue hit $1.5B in 2024, up from $671M in 2023, and it finished the year with 2.6M funded accounts, with $42.8B in assets held on the platform (Bloomberg)
Atlassian reports Q2 revenue of $1.29B vs. $1.24B est. and expects 26.5% cloud growth, 21.5% data center growth for the fiscal year; TEAM jumps 18%+ (Samantha Subin/CNBC)
